dcterms:description: A large dataset of TripAdvisor hotel reviews, where reviews are segmented into statements with sentiment labels (positive, negative, conflict, and neutral).

dcterms:description: A dataset of reviews of electronic products, split into sentences, with corresponding sentiment for each sentence manually tagged.
